settings.text:
Revolutionary AI Voice Recorder for Smart
Academic Learning
In today's academic landscape, lecture documentation faces persistent challenges:
Traditional classroom recording devices arebulky and produce poor audio quality, affecting learning experience
Manual note-taking cannot keep up with lecturer pace, leading to missed important knowledge points
Multi-language courses and international academic exchanges create language comprehension barriers
Post-lecture review struggles with quickly locating key content and important concepts
UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder is specifically designed to address these academic challenges, making every lecture efficient and valuable for learning.
Master Academic Learning in Three Smart Steps
Magnetic AI Voice Recorder: HD Noise Reduction & Mobile AI Assistant

Compatible with Apple, Samsung, Google,
and other mainstream brands

Want to fully leverage the powerful features of UMEVO Note Plus? Follow our comprehensive setup and usage guide,

from basic configuration to advanced features, to become a meeting documentation expert.
• Download "AI DVR Link" from App Store or Google Play
• Create your app account for device management
• Long press Record button for 3 seconds until "Welcome" appears
• Open app and follow instructions to bind device

• NOTE Mode: Toggle right for classroom lectures and
    face-to-face learning
• CALL Mode: Toggle left for online courses and remote learning
• Optimal placement position guidance for differentlearning environments
• App Control: Use AI DVR Link app interface

Battery:400 mAh
Recording Time:40 hours
Standby Time:60 days
Storage:64 GB

settings.heading: What types of courses and lectures is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

settings.text: UMEVO Note Plus is perfect for various academic scenarios including university classroom lectures, seminars, online courses, academic conferences, and training sessions. Whether it's science, humanities, or professional skill training, it provides clear recording and accurate transcription, especially suitable for courses requiring extensive professional terminology and complex concepts.

settings.heading: How is recording quality in large classrooms or noisy environments?

settings.text: The device features advanced AI noise cancellation technology that effectively filters classroom background noise, air conditioning sounds, and student whispers while highlighting the lecturer's voice. Even in large lecture halls or open learning spaces, it ensures course content remains clear and audible, maintaining high transcription accuracy levels.

settings.heading: How does it handle courses with professional terminology?

settings.text: The system includes built-in professional vocabulary databases that accurately recognize specialized terms, formula expressions, and academic concepts across various disciplines. For unique terminology, users can manually edit and annotate, and the system will learn and automatically recognize them in subsequent transcriptions. It supports multiple academic fields including medicine, law, engineering, and business.

settings.heading: How is learning data privacy and security ensured?

settings.text: The system employs end-to-end encryption technology to protect learning data security, supporting both local storage and cloud backup. Users have complete control over data storage methods, and all transmission processes are encrypted. It's particularly suitable for handling sensitive academic content and research materials, ensuring intellectual property and privacy security.

settings.heading: What about battery life for long courses?

settings.text: The 400mAh battery supports 40 hours of continuous recording with 60 days of standby time. It can easily handle full-day courses, multi-day seminars, or intensive training sessions. The 64GB storage space can save hundreds of hours of course recordings, meeting an entire semester's learning requirements.

What types of courses and lectures is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

UMEVO Note Plus is perfect for various academic scenarios including university classroom lectures, seminars, online courses, academic conferences, and training sessions. Whether it's science, humanities, or professional skill training, it provides clear recording and accurate transcription, especially suitable for courses requiring extensive professional terminology and complex concepts.
How is recording quality in large classrooms or noisy environments?

The device features advanced AI noise cancellation technology that effectively filters classroom background noise, air conditioning sounds, and student whispers while highlighting the lecturer's voice. Even in large lecture halls or open learning spaces, it ensures course content remains clear and audible, maintaining high transcription accuracy levels.

The system includes built-in professional vocabulary databases that accurately recognize specialized terms, formula expressions, and academic concepts across various disciplines. For unique terminology, users can manually edit and annotate, and the system will learn and automatically recognize them in subsequent transcriptions. It supports multiple academic fields including medicine, law, engineering, and business.
How is learning data privacy and security ensured?

The system employs end-to-end encryption technology to protect learning data security, supporting both local storage and cloud backup. Users have complete control over data storage methods, and all transmission processes are encrypted. It's particularly suitable for handling sensitive academic content and research materials, ensuring intellectual property and privacy security.
What about battery life for long courses?

The 400mAh battery supports 40 hours of continuous recording with 60 days of standby time. It can easily handle full-day courses, multi-day seminars, or intensive training sessions. The 64GB storage space can save hundreds of hours of course recordings, meeting an entire semester's learning requirements.
